resources.string: Current mobile phone scanning Bluetooth needs to open the positioning function
new device discovered, please open the list to view
No hidden device has been found yet. Please wait patiently

Automatically connect raspberry pie and send VIO data when this application is opened. Please turn on bluetooth for raspberry pie to ensure a smooth connection
 
Please walk around the house with this device and raspberry pie in hand to collect RSSI and VIO information
 
The new device found will be updated in the list and display a sphere in the corresponding position. Please wait patiently
 
Click on the list item and the purple arrow will show you the direction
 
Click the occlusion button to switch the occlusion mode to make AR objects integrate into the real environment/ignore reality occlusion and display completely
 
AR needs to locate according to the points with obvious features. Try not to make the picture taken by the camera too monotonous (for example, a large solid color wall / floor, occlusion lens causes pure black) or shake violently. Please use it in a well-lit environment.
